title: Multivariate Cox Regression Forest Plot - Gastric Cancer Prognostic Analysis
description: Multivariate Cox proportional hazards regression analysis examining the prognostic significance of LMOD1 expression and clinical factors (age, gender, T stage, N stage) in gastric cancer using GSE84437 dataset. Reproduces Figure 3 Panel A showing hazard ratios with 95% confidence intervals.
paper_title: Multivariate Cox regression analysis of prognostic genes and therapeutic mechanisms of gastric cancer
analysis_type: Multivariate Cox proportional hazards regression with forest plot visualization
key_findings: LMOD1 (HR=1.240, p<0.001), Age (HR=1.026, p<0.001), T stage (HR=1.508, p=0.001), and N stage (HR=1.535, p<0.001) are significant prognostic factors
